mapper.select: select r.* from tbl_activity_remark r join tbl_activity a on r.activityId = a.id and a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_activity_remark set noteContent = #{noteContent},editTime=#{editTime},editBy=#{editBy},editFlag=1 where id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity_remark (id, noteContent, createTime, createBy,editFlag, activityId) values (#{id},#{noteContent},#{createTime},#{createBy},#{editFlag},#{activityId});
